inlineContent.text: A block to call when the request completes.
The block receives the following parameters:
An array of
objects containing the player identifiers for the players who are friends of the local player. If an error occurs, this value can be non-
. In that case, the array contains the data that GameKit downloads before the error occurs.
friendPlayers
If an error occurs, this parameter holds an error object that explains the error. Otherwise, the value of this parameter is
error
